sourcesContent:
import './List.css' export default function List({item, book, setBook, marked, setMarked}){ const marking=(e)=>{ console.log('처음엔', marked) setMarked(!marked) console.log('상태변경 후',marked) sessionStorage.setItem(item.id,marked) console.log('세션에 넣고 나서',marked) marked==='true'? e.target.classList.remove('true', 'false') : e.target.classList.add(marked) console.log('최종',marked) } return(
{item.title || item.brand_name} {item.discountPercentage? {item.discountPercentage+`%`} : null} {item.follower? 관심고객수 : null}
{item.sub_title} {item.price? item.price+`원` : item.follower}
) }
